description: I tried to get to Divide lake in the Okanagan mountain Park via Mtn Goat Trail, but the trail gets lost about 3/4 of the way up.  I hope the trail gets blazed by the park service.
directions:
Naramata Rd to Chute Lake Rd follow the signs to the park trail head.

Note: A user sent the attached map & GPS data, perhaps this will help.
title: Mtn Goat trail
